full_summary:
---

**Title:**
Enclosed Trailer - Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:**
W8476-246864/A

**Publication Date:**
2024-05-10

**Tender Closing Date:**
2024-06-04T14:00:00

**Amendment Date:**
2024-06-04

**_procurement Categories:
* Procurement Category: GD
* UN/CEFACT Codes: 25181700
* Description: Product and material trailers*

**Procurement Method:**
Competitive - Selective tendering

**Selection Criteria:**
 Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the following agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
* Worldwide

**Regions of Delivery:**
* Canada

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of National Defence Headquarters, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada.

**Notice:**
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply ofquanitty fifteen (15) enclosed trailers and related items under the supply arrangement E60HP-19TRLR/HP, Configuration 6, 8, 9, 12, 13, 14. Delivery is expected within 120 days after receipt of order (ARO).

**Pre-qualification:**
This bid is open only to suppliers holding a supply arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR. Potential bidders can apply to become a pre-qualified supplier through the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.

**Contact Information:**
Dong Le, Contracting Authority, (999) 999-9999, dong.le@forces.gc.ca.


---

Notes:

* Removed redundant information and unnecessary sections
* Corrected spelling and grammar errors 
* Reformatted text to make it easier to read and more visually
